Quick Tips

There’s processes that go unnoticed throughout our workday. Those that make work more efficient; to the point where we forget that they aren’t the natural stroke, just a useful quirk in our subconscious. When we think of these quick, but super useful tips, we’ll post them here. They range from hotkey strokes to simple lines of code.

Hotkey Tips:

  • Paste
  • Fill & Stroke
  • Selection

Web-site development:

  • Google Web Fonts
  • Numbered Icons in Leaflet
